name: Cairns Health
headline: Your voice. Your health. We care.
description: Cairns Health is creating a fundamentally better healthcare experience for people with chronic health conditions and those who care for them. We make healthcare more accessible by simplifying complex care plans, connecting care teams and meeting patients where they live. Through our conversational AI, patients use their voice to interact with our digital care companion, who proactively gives medication reminders, symptom checks, behavioral nudges and even engages in friendly conversation to ease loneliness. Cairns uses a device that includes radar to put the patient in context and passively monitors their activities, including: heart rate, breathing rate and sleep stages, all without a wearable. The result is informed and timely intervention that drives improved clinical outcomes, reduced care delivery costs and a more satisfactory healthcare experience for all.

founders.name: Brad Eckert
founders.description: Founder/CTO of Woz. Prev Founder & leader of >30 person engineering team at Cairns Health (YC S17, formerly Totemic). Built deep learning radars in consumer electronics for the home environment and an LLM enabled cure for chronic insomnia. MIT EECS, AI Masters dropout, co-author on 25+ patents.

# We Care
For caregivers
Max is caring for his family while also taking care of his mom. Cairns gives him peace of mind by keeping him in touch and in the loop.
# Your Voice
For patients
Jane wants to live her life her way and stay independent for as long as she can. Cairns helps her do exactly that.
# Your Health
For clinical teams
Dr. Marquez has too many patients and not enough time. Cairns eases her burden, prioritizes her patient load and improves her ability to care.
# We Care
For caregivers
Max is caring for his family while also taking care of his mom. Cairns gives him peace of mind by keeping him in touch and in the loop.
# Your Voice
For patients
Jane wants to live her life her way and stay independent for as long as she can. Cairns helps her do exactly that.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/670923b9bc85ffebbc286905_hero%20video.avif)See Cairns in action01:11](https://www.cairns.ai/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=1DSIia6bayU>)
A day with Cairns
## 
Voice-driven 24/7 patient
engagement & care support
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/67093b2debeb45be6fa105aa_timeline%20image%201.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/66f443fad733a39c9f5d4fe9_image%203.avif)
Good morning! How are you feeling today?
8:00 AM
### Helping you wake up
Through a normal conversation, Cairns can uncover care issues and engage with the patient on their terms, starting with “Good morning, How are you feeling today?”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/677d4a6467b8769ce6f7f8c4_day%202.1.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/66f53d3df7583068f4bef968_2.1.avif)
Hey Nancy! It’s time to take your medication. The dosage is 10mg.
8:30 AM
### Medication reminders
Our Cairns device assists patients in managing their medication schedules by offering timely reminders and tracking adherence.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/66f53d3daa9109b0fbe48066_3.1.avif)
Hi Patrick! Just checking in – how are you feeling today?
10:00 AM
### Behavioral health
Cairns engages patients on a regular basis with assessments, and she also addresses issues with loneliness and social isolation.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/677d4bc26656c588b865a62d_day%204.1.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/66f53d3dce701370efae66ac_4.1.avif)
At 2PM, you have a phone call appointment with your nurse. Are you still available?
1:00 PM
### Care support
Cairns assists in scheduling and preparing for your appointments, as well as arranging transportation.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/677d4c8c5d8b32fba853b98f_day%205.1.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/677d4c8dc765246d913cbe6c_day%205.2.avif)
Let's check your symptoms. Say YES if they apply, NO if they don’t.
Abnormal heart rate
4:00 PM
### Dynamic health tracking
Cairns' multiple sensors provide real-time monitoring by detecting changes in a patient's status within their space.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/66f53d3ecf08dd300437526f_6.2.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/66f53d3dc950f4e6bbddf501_6.1.avif)
It’s almost time for bed. Want to do a gratitude journal before you go to sleep?
9:00 PM
### Evening wind-down
The key to a successful tomorrow begins the night before. With Cairns, you can easily follow your routine, from meditation to winding down for restful sleep.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f28bc0f13f3f30564a29db/66f5410dae326ad8a6d0ebcf_6.3.avif)
Use your voice
8:00 AM
8:30 AM
10 AM
1:00 PM
4:00 PM
9:00 PM

Use cases
## 
Serving all stakeholders
what really matters
[](https://www.cairns.ai/<#>)[](https://www.cairns.ai/<#>)
Providers / Health Systems
Home care
Senior care
Aging at home
Remote Patient Monitoring / Chronic Care Management
Family
Providers / Health Systems
Home care
### Home care
No bedroom should feel like a hospital room, and we make sure it doesn't. The most comfortable place for a patient is their home. Cairns simplifies healthcare by bringing care to the bedside and breaking down plans into easy, manageable steps.
### Senior care
Senior care environments need cost effective solutions to enhance care, outcomes, and patient satisfaction. Cairns Health's Cairns Platform enables teams to maximize their skills while easing burdens on clinical staff and integrating families into the care process.
### Aging at home
With the goal of increasing healthspan and supporting independent living for as long as possible, Cairns brings the best of technology and innovation and puts it where it matters, bridging care gaps to bring much-needed support services and care plans to the home.
### RPM/CCM
RPM and CCM requirements can be taxing and frequently providers fulfill the work, but can't get paid for their efforts. With Cairns' continuous ambient sensing, Cairns provides the capability to monitor patients 24/7 without the need for a wearable, helping you achieve better staff utilization rates and enhance your data collection, lowering the overall cost of care delivery.
### Family
Caring for a loved one can often turn into feeling like an obligation. Designed to meet the needs of caregivers, Cairns keeps families informed, reducing the anxiety that comes from wondering if your loved on is being cared for. Also, Cairns helps you stay connected with bi-directional communication embedded into the platform so you can easily check in.
### Providers / Health Systems
Hospitals face growing demands for accessible care, with patients seeking solutions that reduce travel and time off work. Cairns supports Hospital at Home initiatives by helping hospitals integrate seamlessly into patients' lives. It offers education, aids in preparation and recovery, and provides non-intrusive health and social determinants monitoring.
### Home care

### Senior care
Senior care environments need cost effective solutions to enhance care, outcomes, and patient satisfaction. Cairns Health's Cairns Platform enables teams to maximize their skills while easing burdens on clinical staff and integrating families into the care process.

generated_description:
Cairns Health, founded in 2017 and emerging from Y Combinator's S17 batch, is redefining the healthcare experience for individuals with chronic health conditions and their caregivers. Their mission—"Your voice. Your health. We care."—is central to how they approach healthcare: by making it more accessible and less daunting.

Located in Sunnyvale, CA, Cairns Health employs a nimble team of 17 and leverages advanced technology to create a digital care companion that interacts with patients through conversational AI. This system simplifies complex care plans, connects care teams, and meets patients right where they live. One of their standout features is a radar-based monitoring device that continuously tracks vital metrics—like heart rate and sleep stages—without the need for wearables. This means proactive, informed interventions that enhance clinical outcomes and patient satisfaction while trimming care delivery costs.

Cairns Health’s solution isn’t just about monitoring health; it’s about fostering engagement. Patients, like Jane, can use their voice to manage medications, receive behavioral nudges, and combat feelings of isolation through friendly conversation. For caregivers, like Max caring for his mother, Cairns provides updates and peace of mind. And for clinical teams, it alleviates workload pressures by streamlining communication and care coordination.

The company is deeply committed to improving healthcare for all stakeholders—from individual patients to health systems and families—by integrating smart technology into everyday routines. Additionally, their involvement with the American Heart Association's Innovators' Network speaks volumes about their commitment to collaboration and innovation.

In summary, Cairns Health is not merely a tech company; it’s a player in an essential industry, taking bold strides toward improving how care is delivered, making it more user-friendly, and putting the power back into the hands of patients. They are on a mission to build a future where healthcare feels accessible, personalized, and human-like. If you're interested, you can learn more at [Cairns Health](https://www.cairns.ai).
